get.description: Retrieve a specific question by ID
Retrieve a specific form by ID

post.description: Create a duplicate of an existing form

roleId.description: Role ID to assign to the user

post.description: Authenticate user and return JWT token in cookie
Create a new response submission. The responder is automatically set from the authenticated user's JWT token.

response.description: Response value (type varies by question type)

get.summary: Download all responses for a form as JSON
Download a specific user's response for a form as JSON

post.summary: Generate export link for a specific user's response
Generate export link for all responses of a form

delete.summary: Delete all responses by form ID

get.description: Retrieve a list of all roles

post.description: Create a new role with permissions

name.description: Role name (will be converted to uppercase)

get.description: Retrieve a specific role by ID
Retrieve a list of all users
Retrieve a specific user by ID
